Featuring Kuromi and her lovable friends, this playful and heartwarming design brings charm and joy to your browsing experience. Navigate effortlessly with popular site shortcuts, add custom links, and stay on top of your schedule with the integrated calendar and clock. Search the web smoothly with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy the cheerful scene of Kuromi and her friends.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your tab with the links you visit most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
